channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Upgrade your PC setup with affordable accessories that actually make a difference — my top finds for a keyboard, mouse, and more
item.description: I rounded up my must-have peripherals for a fantastic PC setup - and they're on sale for up to 51% off this holiday season.

item.title: OnePlus 15 vs Google Pixel 10 : comment choisir le meilleur téléphone à moins de 1000 euros ?
item.description: Google prend du galon tous les ans avec ses nouveaux Pixel, alors que OnePlus a pour sa part un peu perdu de sa superbe auprès des consommateurs. Et si les choses changeaient, cette année ? Confrontons les OnePlus 15 et Google Pixel 10 pour y voir plus clair.

item.title: Ubisoft shuts down ‘Rainbow Six Siege’ servers following hack
item.description: Yesterday, Ubisoft confirmed that Rainbow Six Siege had been compromised and that it had shut down the game's servers and marketplace while it resolved the issue. The hackers managed to gain control over a significant chunk of the game's systems, including the ability to ban and unban users, sending custom messages to ban ticker, unlocking […]

item.title: MayimFlow wants to stop data center leaks before they happen
item.description: Leaks cause damage, down time, and cost money. MayimFlow's founder John Khazraee wants to change that.

item.title: OpenAI looks to hire a new Head of Preparedness to deal with AIs dangers
item.description: OpenAI is hiring a new Head of Preparedness.

item.title: Ecovacs Deebot X9 Pro Omni : le puissant robot aspirateur perd 55 % de son prix
item.description: Un robot aspirateur, on lui demande l’essentiel : de l’autonomie, de la puissance et le moins d’interventions possible. L’Ecovacs Deebot X9 Pro Omni coche ces cases et revendique la liberté pour son propriétaire. Lancé à 1 599 euros cet été, il s’affiche aujourd’hui à 679 euros chez Amazon.

item.title: The 33 top health and wellness startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the health and wellness Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: The Google Pixel Watch 4 made me like smartwatches again
item.description: Google's Pixel Watch 4 is an excellent smartwatch with fast charging and great design.

item.title: The Year in OLED TVs: 2025 takes the tech to new brightness peaks
item.description: Whether it was Samsung wowing us with its Glare Free technology or the incredibly bright LG G5, OLED ruled the TV world in 2025.

item.title: Stardew Valley players on the Nintendo Switch 2 get a free upgrade
item.description: Stardew Valley is truly the gift that keeps on giving. Fans of the farm life simulator, specifically those who already own it for the Nintendo Switch 2, can download a free upgrade that introduces new features and multiplayer modes. If you have Stardew Valley on the Switch 2, you can download the Upgrade Pack that introduces mouse controls to make it easier to place furniture and organize your inventory. The upgrade also adds local split-screen co-op for up to four players and online multiplayer that maxes out at eight players. On top of the co-op modes, the free content pack includes Game Sha...

item.title: The Absolute Universe Gave DC a Great Comics Year
item.description: People are loving the new Absolute takes on Batman, Wonder Woman, and other heroes that've been hitting comic stores every month.
